About Me

Thanks for visiting my page! I am currently WFH full time, and I have been really enjoying my job as a consultant. I am a proud father of three and enjoy. I will periodically update this page as I think of better things to say, but if you would like to talk, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Interests

I have always wanted to create video games, and my love for games led me towards the front-end within web development. It has been there that I have been able to enjoy my time at work and grow into the professional I am today. My thirst for knowledge keeps me intersted in learning, dev Ops, backend, and other parts of the development cycle.
